name: 施青良
objective: 本課程旨在幫助學生奠定英語基礎，以促進英語聽、說、讀、寫能力之提升，並教導學生自學、自修的方法，提高英語學習的興趣。
schedule:
week 1 word order in question / vowel sounds
w2 simple present / the plural -s
w3 present continuous / vowel sounds
w4 defining relative clauses / using a dictionary
w5 practical English: At the airport
w6 simple past / -ed endings, irregular verbs
w7 past continuous / [ə] and [ər]
w8 auxiliaries / [w] and [h]
w9 mid term week
w10 so, because, but, although / the letter ”a”
w11 practical English: At the conference hotel
w12 Aux: going to, present continuous / sentence stress
w13 Aux: predictions / contractions
w14 Aux: promises, offers, decisions / word stress
w15 review of tense / sentence stress 
w16 Practical English : restaurant problems 
w17 Review 
w18 Final exam week
materials: Oxenden et al., American English File 2A (Oxford University Press)
